pages.text: A form of energy essential for Alchemy.

pages.title: Aspect Extraction
pages.text: Alchemical Aspects can be extracted from objects that embody their respective concepts.$(br2)When a small amount is needed, they can be extracted using Zardius Alchemy with water.

pages.title: Aspect Storage
pages.text: Because Alchemical Aspects are unstable and dangerous, they cannot be stored in their raw state, so they are sealed inside crystals for storage.$(br2)Tourmaline and Quartz are known to be suitable crystals for sealing.$(br2)Also, once sealed, the Alchemical Aspects permeate the crystal's properties and change their nature, so they cannot be reused.

pages.title: Small-Scale Aspect Production
pages.text: Using Zardius Alchemy, you can extract Alchemical Aspect Crystals from the following materials.

pages.title: Ember Crystal
pages.text: A heated crystal. Can be extracted from fuel.

pages.title: Glace Crystal
pages.text: A crystal that grows from its surroundings. Extracted from crystals.

pages.title: Surge Crystal
pages.text: A flickering crystal. Extracted from metals.

pages.title: Phantom Crystal
pages.text: A passing-through crystal. Extracted from semi-tangible substances.

pages.title: Tremor Crystal
pages.text: A trembling crystal. Extracted from rocks.

pages.title: Magic Crystal
pages.text: A crystal that emits power. Extracted from Mana-infused materials.

pages.title: Flow Crystal
pages.text: A crystal wrapped in wind. Extracted from living beings.

pages.title: Hollow Crystal
pages.text: A crystal that distorts time and space. Extracted from the Void.
